comment: Nice! I got an online booking link for one pharmacy and booked for th, then got a link from another (closer) one with openings on the th and switched. So anticlimactic but great!

comment: same here. i called an independent pharmacy in my city about /2 hr after the said they were lowering the age and got an appt for tomorrow afternoon!!! i thought for sure i would have to go to the drive thru this weekend.
